login_subtext: Enter your email and password to login
signup_context: Enter your name, email and password to sign up
register_failed_text: The email address you provided is already registered. Please use a different email address.
register_password_length_incorrect: Passwords need to be at least 9 characters
add_user_failed_message: Please ensure all fields are filled
add_user_failed_exists_message: This user already exists on the organisation, please use edit function.
update_user_failed_non_exists_message: User is not added to the organisation
found_user: found! If this is the person your looking for please continue the form.
delete_user_info:
Are you sure you want to delete this user from the organization? This action will permanently revoke their access from all organizational modules.
Please ensure that this is the intended action before proceeding.
delete_model_info:
Are you sure you want to delete this model from the organization?
This action will permanently revoke their access from all organizational modules.
Please ensure that this is the intended action before proceeding.
activate_client_info:
Are you sure you want activate the client for this model?
This action will start retrieving messages for the model, the normal site should not be used at this point anymore.
Please ensure that this is the intended action before proceeding.
extend_client_info:
Are you sure you want extend the client for this model?
This action will temporary suspend all client traffic, after a few seconds the key is extended for a new period.
Please ensure that this is the intended action before proceeding.
deactivate_client_info:
Are you sure you want deactivate the client for this model?
This action will permanently suspend all client traffic.
Please ensure that this is the intended action before proceeding.
